Pattern Library

breadcrumbs component

RULES & DEPENDENCIES:

This component will have fields for:

  • name - the name of the page
  • link - the link to the page (optional)

Note: the full breadcrumbs will be shown on desktop, but on mobile only the previous level will be shown

EXAMPLE:

  • Home
  • Resources
  • This Article
